explanation: [0-0] The video starts at the doorway of a family home. The dad, dressed as Luffy with a red shirt, blue shorts, and a straw hat, holds a broom and a dustpan. His daughter, wearing a blue sequined dress and carrying a schoolbag, stands at the door, ready for school. His son, also wearing a straw hat, red shirt, and blue shorts, stands beside his sister.
[0-5] The daughter and son hold hands and wave goodbye to their dad, ready to leave. The dad looks at his children with a sad expression.
